CustomField.description: LF membership is required if this project is a Subproject, it has membership, and its parent project is The Linux Foundation. The value of this field is set by workflow rules.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicates if LF membership is required in addition to membership to this project. LF membership is required if this project is a Subproject, it has membership, and its parent project is The Linux Foundation.
CustomField.label: LF Membership Required?
